participant_1.background:
I'm not very concerned about my appearance, as long as I look presentable.
I want a new home that is affordable and close to work so I can save money and keep my financial troubles a secret from my parents.
My power tools are my most valued material possessions because they allow me to express my creativity and make my home a better place.
My eyes are too weak to see the world clearly, but my bones are strong enough to withstand a beating.
I love watching romantic comedies and listening to the Red Hot Chili Peppers.

content.text: Pretty good, thanks! Just hanging out with my pug, Corky.
Oh yeah, I saw you post a picture of him on Instagram. He's so cute!
I'm glad you have someone to keep you company. I'm single, so I spend a lot of time alone.
Aww, I'm sorry to hear that. But hey, you can always come hang out with me and Corky!
I'd love to! I love pugs.
Great! We can go to the park or something.
That sounds like fun. I'm free on Saturday.
Perfect! I'll bring Corky and we can have a pug playdate.
Sounds great! I'll see you then!
